pages.text: 21|45|(he nabee!) aap kah den ki main to vahyee hee ke aadhaar par tumhen saavadhaan kar raha hoon. (parantu) bahare pukaar nahin sunate, jab unhen saavadhaan kiya jaata hai.
21|46|aur yadi chhoo jaaye unhen aapake paalanahaar kee tanik bhee yaatana, to avashy pukaarenge ki haay hamaara vinaash! nishchay hee ham atyaachaaree[1] the.

21|47|aur ham rakh denge nyaay ka taraazoo[1] pralay ke din, phir nahin atyaachaar kiya jaayega kisee par kuchh bhee tatha yadi hoga raay ke daane ke baraabar (kisee ka karm) to ham use saamane le aayenge aur ham bas (kaafee) hain haisaab lene vaale.
21|48|aur ham de chuke hain, moosa tatha haaroon ko vivek, prakaash aur shikshaaprad pustak aagyaakaariyon ke lie.
21|49|jo darate hon apane paalanahaar se bin dekhe aur ve pralay se bhayabheet hon.
21|50|aur ye (quraan) ek shubh shiksha hai, jise hamane utaara hai, to kya tum isake inkaaree ho
21|51|aur hamane pradaan kee thee ibraaheem ko, usakee chetana isase pahale aur ham usase bhalee-bhaanti avagat the.
21|52|jab usane apane baap tatha apanee jaati se kahaah ye pratimaen (moortiyaan) kaisee hain, jinakee pooja mein tum lage hue ho
21|53|unhonne kahaah hamane paaya hai apane poorvajon ko inakee pooja karate hue.
21|54|us (ibraaheem) ne kahaah nishchay tum aur tumhaare poorvaj khule kupath mein ho.
21|55|unhonne kahaah kya tum laaye ho hamaare paas saty ya tum upahaas kar rahe ho
21|56|usane kahaah balki tumhaara paalanahaar aakaashon tatha dharatee ka paalanahaar hai, jisane unhen paida kiya hai aur main to iseeka saakshee hoon.
21|57|tatha allaah kee shapath! main avashy chaal chaloonga tumhaaree moortiyon ke saath, isake pashchaat ki tum chale jao.
